channel.title: MongoDB operations exceeded time limit
channel.description: A number of our queries are taking longer to run but failing due to MongoDB's query time limit. I want to increase this time limit using `maxTimeMs` ([docs](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/command/aggregate/)) but I'm not sure how to provide these additional options with Redash.

item.title: MongoDB operations exceeded time limit
item.dc:creator: wrecodde
item.description:
A number of our queries are taking longer to run but failing due to MongoDB’s query time limit.
I want to increase this time limit using maxTimeMs (docs) but I’m not sure how to provide these additional options with Redash.

Read full topic
